tagline: SBARS - bioinformatics tool for search different types of long repeats in sequences comparable by size with chromosomes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: SBARS - Spectral-Based Approach for Repeats Search
body:
### Latest builds  

**Windows:**
* [precompiled version for Windows](https://github.com/mpyatkov/sbars/raw/master/SBARS_win.zip)  
tested on WinXP, Vista, Win7. All necessary libraries are included in the archive.

**Linux:**  
* [precompiled version for Ubuntu 12.04](https://github.com/mpyatkov/sbars/raw/master/SBARS_win.zip)  
tested only on Ubuntu 12.04 for others distributives may require additional libraries.

**Documentation:**  
* [User manual](https://github.com/mpyatkov/sbars/raw/master/SBARS_win.zip) - 
The latest documentation in PDF format.
